summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley between Block 7 and 8, and Blocks 17 and 18, Euclid Addition, being the alley between 50th Avenue Southwest and 51st Avenue Southwest, from West Genesee Street to West Alaska Street; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6808 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
